name: Robin Hoodie [WIP]
description:
[Unfinished - there is no victory or score or export of your generated rap/poem]

Go to the game jam submission page for the downloads:
https://itch.io/jam/the-public-domain-jam-3/rate/6...

WIP for Public Domain Jam 3. #PDJAM.

This is a modern-day anthropomorphic-animal inner-city reinterpretation of Robin Hood.

Help Robin Hoodie of Sherwood Apartments protect the poor from the police brutality of the corrupt Sheriff of Nottingham Avenue.

Collect words and form your rap or poem. Shoot the Sheriff with the words.

Move: WASD keys or Arrow Keys

Jump: Spacebar

Fire: Left Click (you need to pick up words first)

Attributions:

DataMuse API to find rhymes and related words.

Carnegie Mellon University's Sphinx pronunciation dictionary to evaluate rhymes and syllables.

Taser sound by BMacZero

Police Siren Sound by FatLane
